content: Our sales revenue for the second quarter of fiscal 2023 grew 28.3% year-over-year, while we reduced our operating expenses by 37%, approximately $5.7 million. For the second quarter in a row, we have shown improvement to our operating expenses, which are down approximately $5.7 million or 37% year-over-year. G&A for the first two quarters of this year is now down almost $4.8 million, 47% compared to the first half of fiscal 2022. For the three months ended September 30, 2022, we have reported our best quarterly revenue ever of approximately $19.6 million compared to the $15.3 million for the three months ended September 30, 2021. Our gross profit for the quarter ended September 30, 2022, was approximately $4.6 million or 23.6% compared to the approximately $5.2 million for the prior year quarter. Total operating expenses for the three months ended September 30, 2022, were approximately $9.7 million compared to the approximately $15.4 million in the quarter ended September 30, 2021, and approximately $5.7 million reduction in total operating expenses. Total operating losses for the quarter ended September 30, 2022, was approximately $5.1 million, approximately $5 million improvement compared to the $10.2 million in the prior year quarter. Net loss improved by approximately $2 million, an $8.4 million loss in the quarter ended September 30, 2022, compared to the $10.4 million loss in the quarter ended September 30, 2021. The company converted approximately $3.8 million in debt and received proceeds from the associated exercise warrants during the quarter ended September 30, 2022. Without this non-cash charge in the quarter, ended September 30, 2022, our net income improvement would have been approximately $5 million.
